Package com.adobe.aem.commons.assetshare.content.renditions

Interface AssetRenditionDispatcher

  • @ConsumerType
public interface AssetRenditionDispatcher
    An OSGi Service (with multiple implementations) that dispatches requests to the AssetRenditionsServlet to some representation of the resolved asset rendition. This could be a static rendition (resource in AEM), or ACS Commons Named Image Transform, Dynamic Media, etc. via internal forward/redirects or external redirects (301/302).

      Dispatch the request to the appropriate mechanism that will provide the desired rendition.
      String getLabel()  
      String getName()

      Option map entries in the form:
      - key: Option Label
      - value: Rendition Name
      Set<String> getRenditionNames()  
      default List<String> getTypes()
      Ideally a rendition dispatcher instances returns renditions that apply to all types returned bu this method.
      default boolean isHidden()
      Returning true will prevent this AssetRenditionDispatcher's options from being listed in the AssetRenditionsDataSource.

    • Method Detail

      • getLabel

        String getLabel()
        Returns:
        the friendly name of this Rendition Resolver displayed to Authors.

      • getName

        String getName()
        The return value fo this method is used to select the AssetRenditionDispatcher by the AssetRenditionServlet.
        Returns:
        the system name of this Rendition Resolver. This should be unique across all AssetRenditionResolvers instances.

      • getOptions

        Map<String,​String> getOptions()
        Option map entries in the form:
        - key: Option Label
        - value: Rendition Name
        Returns:
        the options provided by the RenditionResolver implementation.

      • getRenditionNames

        Set<String> getRenditionNames()
        Returns:
        a list of all the rendition names this AssetRenditionDispatcher can handle.

      • isHidden

        default boolean isHidden()
        Returning true will prevent this AssetRenditionDispatcher's options from being listed in the AssetRenditionsDataSource.
        Returns:
        true if this AssetRenditionDispatcher is intended to be hidden from the AEM author's view, and used in the programmatic construction of URLs.

      • dispatch

        void dispatch​(org.apache.sling.api.SlingHttpServletRequest request,
              org.apache.sling.api.SlingHttpServletResponse response)
       throws IOException,
              javax.servlet.ServletException
        Dispatch the request to the appropriate mechanism that will provide the desired rendition.
        Parameters:
        request - the SlingHttpServletRequest.
        response - the SlingHttpServletResponse to include the rendition on.
        Throws:
        IOException - if the rendition cannot be written.
        javax.servlet.ServletException - if the request cannot be dispatched properly.

      • getTypes

        default List<String> getTypes()
        Ideally a rendition dispatcher instances returns renditions that apply to all types returned bu this method.
        Returns:
        a list of Rendition Types this rendition Dispatcher will return;
